UData\Widgets
namespace
UData\Widgets
UData\Widgets\UILineBreak

Creates a widget representing an HTML linebreak

Information
Extends

UData\Widgets\StdBase

Options

This widget accepts the following non-standard option: intger count - Is an optional integer indicating how many line breaks required.  All other options are disregarded.
